providers.name: SNCB
providers.description: SNCB is the national railway company of Belgium, providing domestic and international train services.
rules: Advance booking for best prices
Seat reservation recommended on international trains
Non-refundable tickets are cheaper
Changes allowed with fee for flexible tickets
Passenger ID may be required

providers.name: Trainline
providers.description: Trainline is Europe's leading train and bus app. Book rail and coach travel across Europe.
rules: Advance booking required for best prices
E-tickets must be downloaded before travel
Some tickets require printing
Seat reservations mandatory for certain routes
Group discounts available for 4+ passengers
providers.advantages: Specialized in train travel with best prices and real-time updates

providers.name: FlixBus
providers.description: FlixBus is a popular intercity bus service in Europe, offering affordable travel to thousands of destinations.
rules: Tickets must be booked online
Cancellations allowed up to 15 minutes before departure
Rebooking available online
Refunds may incur a processing fee
Valid ID required when boarding
providers.advantages: Affordable travel with modern amenities and frequent departures

providers.name: Direct Ferries
providers.description: Direct Ferries is the world's largest ferry ticket booking site, offering ferry crossings worldwide.
rules: Check-in required 2 hours before departure
Vehicle dimensions must be provided at booking
Pet travel requires special arrangements
Cabin booking recommended for night journeys
Passport/ID required for all international routes
providers.advantages: Comprehensive ferry services with extensive route network
